text: well we move to Somalia for some
breaking news because at least one
person's been killed and several others
injured after gunmen attached the Higher
Education Ministry in the Somali capital
Mogadishu police say that suicide
bombers rammed cars into the Ministry
gates before gunmen entered the building
where fighting is continuing we're
getting reports that the Islamist group
al-shabaab says it carried out the
attack it is the latest in a series of
bombings on targets in Mogadishu but
reports that there was a huge explosion
from a car bomb followed by heavy
fighting in this ongoing attack a car
loaded with explosives ramming the gate
gunfire inside the building of the
ministry and it's also being reported
that this government building in
Mogadishu houses both the petroleum
ministries and the higher education
ministries
